'''Carvanha''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''キバニア''' ''Kibanha'') is a dual-type {{2t|Water|Dark}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation III]].

It [[Evolution|evolve]]s into {{p|Sharpedo}} starting at [[level]] 30.

==Biology==
Carvanha is a fish Pokémon with a body covered in tiny, sharp {{wp|denticle}}s. The top half of its spherical body is blue, while the bottom half is red with a yellow, four-pointed star below its mouth. It has two yellow {{wp|dorsal fins}} above its eyes that resemble shark fins, and a matching {{wp|Fish anatomy#fins|pelvic fin}} on its belly. Its pectoral fins are also yellow. The caudal fin is composed of two red spines with a thin yellow membrane stretched between them.

It has powerful jaws and razor sharp teeth that are able to chew through solid steel and rip up boat hulls. It swarms any intruder and prey that invade its territory, and becomes timid when it is alone. It lives in {{DL|List of Pokémon by habitat|Sea Pokémon|rivers that course through jungles}}.

==In the anime==
===In the main series===
[[File:Carvanha anime.png|thumb|220px|left|Carvanha in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
====Major appearances====
Carvanha debuted in ''[[AG024|A Corphish Out of Water]]''. When {{Ash}} had to take his sick {{AP|Corphish}} to a [[Pokémon Center]], he had to cross a river that was infested with Carvanha.

Over the series, Carvanha was one of the Pokémon used by [[Team Aqua]].

A Carvanha appeared in ''[[SM012|The Sun, the Scare, the Secret Lair!]]''. [[James]] tried to catch it, but failed.

====Minor appearances====
A Carvanha appeared in the opening sequence of ''[[M07|Destiny Deoxys]]''.

A Carvanha appeared in ''[[DP089|Up Close and Personable!]]''

Multiple Carvanha appeared in ''[[M17|Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction]]''.

A Carvanha appeared in ''[[SM001|Alola to New Adventure!]]''.

Two Carvanha appeared in ''[[SM005|Yo, Ho, Ho! Go, Popplio!]]'', during a fantasy.

===In Pokémon Generations===
[[File:Tentacool Huntail Carvanha Clamperl PG.png|thumb|250px|Carvanha in [[Pokémon Generations]]]]
A wild Carvanha appeared in the waters that surrounded the [[Seafloor Cavern]] in ''[[PG08|The Cavern]]''.
{{-}}

==In the manga==
[[File:Amber Carvanha Adventures.png|thumb|125px|Carvanha in [[Pokémon Adventures]]]]
===In the Pokémon Adventures manga===
Carvanha was one of the Pokémon owned by {{tc|Aqua Admin}} {{FB|Aqua Admin|Amber}}, first appearing in ''[[PS188|Lombre Larceny]]''. Amber used Carvanha's {{a|Rough Skin}} to wear down {{adv|Sapphire}}'s [[Chic|Torchic]] and [[Rono|Aron]]. It was later left behind at the [[Seafloor Cavern]] to cover for its Trainer as he made his escape.

In ''[[PAORAS08|Omega Alpha Adventure 8]]'', a {{tc|Team Aqua Grunt}} used a Carvanha to battle at [[Sea Mauville]].

In ''[[PAORAS13|Omega Alpha Adventure 13]]'', a second Matt appears using a Carvanha at [[Mossdeep City]] to attack {{adv|Sapphire}} to prevent her from stopping [[Zinnia]]'s plan.

==Trivia==
* Carvanha is tied with {{p|Magikarp}} for having the lowest {{stat|Special Defense}} stat of all {{type|Water}} Pokémon. It also has the lowest Special Defense stat of all {{type|Dark}} Pokémon. In addition, it is tied with five other Pokémon for having the lowest Special Defense stat of all Pokémon.
* Carvanha has the lowest base {{stat|Defense}} of all {{type|Dark}} Pokémon.

===Origin===
Carvanha is mostly based on {{wp|piranha}}s.

====Name origin====
Carvanha may be a combination of ''carve'' or ''carnivore'' and ''piranha''. It may also be related to ''Carcharodon carcharias'' ("sharp-toothed shark"), the Great White Shark.

Kibanha may be a combination of 牙 ''kiba'' (fang) and ''piranha''.
